title: The Headless Ghost
description: They're baa-ack! Make way for the bestselling children's series of all time! With a fresh new look, GOOSEBUMPS is set to scare a whole new generation of kids. So reader beware--you're in for a scare!They've got a real head start . . . .Everyone knows about Hill House. It's the biggest tourist attraction in town. That's because it's haunted. Haunted by the ghost of a thirteen-year-old boy. A boy with no head!Duane and Stephanie love Hill House. It's dark. And creepy. And totally scary.Still, they've never actually seen the ghost. Until the night they decide to go on a search. A search for his head . . . .Book Paperback Publication 10/1/2004 144 Reading Age 9 and Up
author: R.L. Stine
